actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to assist veterans with a permanent and total service-connected disability due to the loss or loss of use of one upper and one lower extremity to acquire specially adapted housing.

summary.text: Authorizes assistance to veterans with a permanent and total service-connected disability due to the loss or loss of use of one upper and one lower extremity in acquiring specially adapted housing. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 810).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to assist veterans with a permanent and total service-connected disability due to the loss or loss of use of one upper and one lower extremity to acquire specially adapted housing.
